tool.name: diffTE

param.name: count_file
param.label: count file computed with the countTE file

param.name: count_column
param.label: number of the first column of count in the count file

param.name: sample_names
param.label: comma separated list of names of the differents sample in the same order as the count file columns (example for n samples with 2 methods: population_1:method_2,population_1:method_2,...,population_n:method_1,population_n:method_2)

tool.help: diffTE documentation: ====================== Perform differential expression analysis using DESeq2 and the count table generated by countTE This tool produces an HTML output with clickable image, that leads to a download of the PDF file.
